text:
Profil e 
I am an Inside  Sales  Engineer  at Emerson,  currently  based  in Aberdeen,  working  in the Flow  Controls  business  unit. I 
graduated  from  Newcastle  University  in 2019  with a 2:1 in Chemical  Engineering  and entered  Emerson  as a Graduate  
Commercial  Engineer.  I am striving  to become  a chartered  engineer.   
Skills  and Experience  
 
Inside  Sales  Engineer , Flow  Controls  (Fisher  Valves),  Emerson , 2020  – Present  
 
- Responsibilities  include  providing  instrumentation  and valve  assembly  solutions  and proposals  to a range  of engineering  
industries , with a quick  turnaround  time.  I also manage  multiple  key focus  accounts , improving  my long standing  
relation ships  with dedicated  clients,  while  also applying  systematic  appro  
 
  
Profil e 
I am an Inside  Sales  Engineer  at Emerson,  currently  based  in Aberdeen,  working  in the Flow  Controls  business  unit. I 
graduated  from  Newcastle  University  in 2019  with a 2:1 in Chemical  Engineering  and entered  Emerson  as a Graduate  
Commercial  Engineer.  I am striving  to become  a chartered  engineer.   
Skills  and Experience  
 
Inside  Sales  Engineer , Flow  Controls  (Fisher  Valves),  Emerson , 2020  – Present  
 
- Responsibilities  include  providing  instrumentation  and valve  assembly  solutions  and proposals  to a range  of engineering  
industries , with a quick  turnaround  time.  I also manage  multiple  key focus  accounts , improving  my long standing  
relation ships  with dedicated  clients,  while  also applying  systematic  approach  to expanding  valued  accounts.  
- Complex  tasks  such as sizing  valves  using  datasheets  provided  utilising  Emerson’s  bespoke  software  under  a sensitive  
turnaround  period.  Customer  focus  and relationship  building  is demonstrated  though constant  contact  with customers  in 
order  to obtain  accurate  information  to efficiently  provide  solutions.  
- My other  responsibilities  include  coordinating  the team  daily,  ensuring  the team  has a manageable  workload  and 
supporting  the team  if any issues  arise. I also took on other  managerial  responsibilities  such as workload  planning  and 
KPI tracking.  This demonstrates  time management,  the ability  to lead the team  to success  of reaching  the KPIs  and unity  
of action  and integration  of individuals  in the team . 
Graduate  Commercial  Engineer , Emerson , 2019 - 2020  
- A rotational  scheme  to achieve  exposure  to Emerson’s  vast business  units  within  UK&I,  primarily  focusing  on customer  
engagement,  products  and solutions.  
- Exposure  to internal  and external  sales,  allowing  practice  of customer  interaction  skills  gained  from  the Mercuri  Sales 
Apprenticeship.   
- Various  projects  tasked , enhancing  presentation  delivery,  effective  communication  and networking  with relevant  
personnel  and project  and time management.  
 
Summer  Placement (s), Exwold , Partners  in Chemical  Processing , 2017,  2018  
- Faced  real life situations  and technical  problems  within  the plant  and oversaw  solutions . 
- Practised  scoping  projects  and determining  the overall  possibilities  of finalising  a project . 
- Understood  the importance  of change  control  process  forms .  
- Enhanced  my current  knowledge  on separation  processes  by studying  scrubber  systems  in detail  in order  to complete  a 
scope . 
- Allowed  me to better  my analytical  techniques , understand  the roles  within  the company  and assess  health  and safety  with 
procedures  such as COSHH . 
- Completed  analysis  and calculations  of samples  of the final products  produced . 
 
Piano  Tutor , Apollo  Music  Service , Stockton -On-Tees , 2014  - 2016  
- Contacted  by and offered  a job by a music  tuition  company , after seeing  my performance  at a high scorer’s concert . 
- Improved  patience  greatly  by consistently  working  with both young  children  and adults  with a varied  age range . 
- Developed  alternative  methods  in techniques  of teaching , as different  individuals  do not respond  in the same  manner . 
- Tailored  style  of communication  depending  on the age of audience . 
 07462671148       nicolacheung@live.co.uk        1FL 19 Howburn  Place,  Aberdeen,  AB11  6XT,  Scotland  Pui Man  Nicola  Cheung  
 
 
 
Cashier  and Assistant  Chef , China  City, Stockton -On-Tees , 2010  - 2020  
- These  roles  enabled  me to maintain  a good  work  ethic , especially  under  stress  and long hours . 
- Generated  excellent  money  managing  and basic  business  skills . 
- Provided  efficient  customer  service , by dealing  with any needs  and requirements , such as the occasional  complaint  and 
enquiries .  
 
Volunteer , AgeUK , Stockton -On-Tees , 2016  
- Enabled  me to evolve  a great  work  ethic  and professional  characteristics , such as self-presentation , while  interacting  with 
the general  p

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
